moves.name: Twin Slash
moves.description: Deal physical damage with a quick two-hit sword combo.

moves.name: Blink Strike
moves.description: Teleport to a target and strike. Ignores Guard/Block effects on the target this hit.

moves.name: Flash Step
moves.description: Teleport to any empty tile within range. Gain Evasion for 1 turn.

moves.name: Hero's Intercept
moves.description: Teleport to an ally and take the next hit meant for them. Gain temporary Armor for 1 turn.

moves.name: Rally Heart
moves.description: Inspire allies in a small area, increasing their Attack for 2 turns.

moves.name: Severing Cut
moves.description: Deal damage and apply Bleed (damage over time).

moves.name: Swordbind
moves.description: Deal light damage and reduce target Attack for 2 turns.

moves.name: Piercing Lunge
moves.description: Deal damage that partially ignores Armor.

moves.name: Blade Whirl
moves.description: Spin attack that hits all enemies adjacent to Cecelia.

moves.name: Afterimage
moves.description: Gain Evasion and Counter for 1 turn.
